list.abs: and you can laugh a spineless laugh ., 你可以嘲笑 , 懦弱地笑吧.
it's as if getting a job somehow drains all the free will out of and turns them into spineless cowards .人们有份工作后，自由意志好像都莫名其妙地被排干了，全变成了没骨气的胆小鬼。
he was a yellow gutless worm ; a spineless craven fellow ., 他是个胆小的 , 没勇气的可怜虫 ; 一个软弱 , 胆小的家伙.
字典中软字的解释 zdic.net ... 软骨[ cartilage] 软骨头[ a weak-kneed person;a spineless person] 软管[ tube].

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of lacking a strong character; an irresolute disposition

auth_sentence.content: Whenever I contemplated my fears, that ostrich figured in my reflections as a kind of emblem of my spinelessness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whenever I contemplated my fears, that ostrich figured in my reflections as a kind of emblem of my spinelessness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whenever I contemplated my fears, that ostrich figured in my reflections as a kind of emblem of my spinelessness.

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, despite the logic, despite their valid fears, their sheer spinelessness grated on him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nevertheless, despite the logic, despite their valid fears, their sheer spinelessness grated on him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nevertheless, despite the logic, despite their valid fears, their sheer spinelessness grated on him.
